00008 function_creators = '''
00009 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00010 
00011 template<%targs%, class RT>
00012 inline function_type* type_of(RT (*)(%args%)) 
00013 { 
00014         typedef RT (FT)(%args%); 
00015         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic<FT, %sargs%, RT>; 
00016         Type* rt = type_of<RT>();
00017         Type* args[%nargs%];%fill_args%
00018         static function_type ft(inv, false, rt, args, %nargs%);
00019         return &ft;
00020 }
00021 
00022 template<%targs%, class RT>
00023 inline function_type* type_of(const RT& (*)(%args%)) 
00024 { 
00025         typedef const RT& (FT)(%args%); 
00026         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic<FT, %sargs%, RT>; 
00027         Type* rt = type_of<RT>();
00028         Type* args[%nargs%];%fill_args%
00029         static function_type ft(inv, false, rt, args, %nargs%);
00030         return &ft;
00031 }
00032 
00033 template<%targs%, class RT>
00034 inline function_type* type_of(RT& (*)(%args%)) 
00035 { 
00036         typedef RT& (FT)(%args%); 
00037         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_ref<FT, %sargs%, RT>;
00038         Type* rt = type_of<RT*>();
00039         Type* args[%nargs%];%fill_args%
00040         static function_type ft(inv, false, rt, args, %nargs%);
00041         return &ft;
00042 }
00043 
00044 template<%targs%>
00045 inline function_type* type_of(void (*)(%args%)) 
00046 { 
00047         typedef void (FT)(%args%); 
00048         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_noret<FT, %sargs%>;
00049         Type* rt = type_of<void>();
00050         Type* args[%nargs%];%fill_args%
00051         static function_type ft(inv, false, rt, args, %nargs%);
00052         return &ft;
00053 }
00054 '''
00055 
00056 method_creators = '''
00057 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058 
00059 template<class C, %targs%, class RT>
00060 inline function_type* type_of(RT (C::*)(%args%) CONST_METH) 
00061 { 
00062         typedef RT (FT)(%args%); 
00063         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_m<FT, %sargs%, RT>;
00064         type* rt = type_of<RT>();
00065         type* args[%nargs%];
00066         args[0] = type_of<C*>();%fill_args%
00067         static function_type ft(inv, true, rt, args, %nargs%); 
00068         return &ft;
00069 }
00070 
00071 template<class C, %targs%, class RT>
00072 inline function_type* type_of(const RT& (C::*)(%args%) CONST_METH) 
00073 { 
00074         typedef const RT& (FT)(%args%); 
00075         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_m<FT, %sargs%, RT>;
00076         type* rt = type_of<RT>();
00077         type* args[%nargs%];
00078         args[0] = type_of<C*>();%fill_args%
00079         static function_type ft(inv, true, rt, args, %nargs%); 
00080         return &ft;
00081 }
00082 
00083 template<class C, %targs%, class RT>
00084 inline function_type* type_of(RT& (C::*)(%args%) CONST_METH) 
00085 { 
00086         typedef RT& (FT)(%args%); 
00087         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_m_ref<FT, %sargs%, RT>;
00088         type* rt = type_of<RT*>();
00089         type* args[%nargs%];
00090         args[0] = type_of<C*>();%fill_args%
00091         static function_type ft(inv, true, rt, args, %nargs%); 
00092         return &ft;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<class C, %targs%>
00096 inline function_type* type_of(void (C::*)(%args%) CONST_METH) 
00097 { 
00098         typedef void (FT)(%args%); 
00099         generic_invoker inv = &invoke_generic_m_noret<FT, %sargs%>;
00100         type* rt = type_of<void>();
00101         type* args[%nargs%];
00102         args[0] = type_of<C*>();%fill_args%
00103         static function_type ft(inv, true, rt, args, %nargs%); 
00104         return &ft;
00105 }

00112 with open('function_typeof.inc', 'w') as file:
00113 
00114         for i in range(0, MAX_PARAMS + 1):
00115                 
00116                 block = function_creators               
00117 
00118                 args = ""
00119                 for j in range(1, i+1):
00120                         args += "A" + str(j) + ", "
00121 
00122                 sargs = ""
00123                 for j in range(1, i+1):
00124                         sargs += "t_strip<A" + str(j) + ">::noref, "
00125 
00126 
00127                 targs = ""
00128                 for j in range(1, i+1):
00129                         targs += "class A" + str(j) + ", "
00130                         
00131                 fill_args = "\n\t"
00132                 for j in range(0, i):
00133                         fill_args += "args[" + str(j) + "] = type_of<A" + str(j+1) + ">();\n\t"
00134 
00135                 block = block.replace("%args%", args[:-2])
00136                 block = block.replace("%sargs%", sargs[:-2])
00137                 block = block.replace("%targs%", targs[:-2])
00138                 block = block.replace("%fill_args%", fill_args[:-2])
00139                 block = block.replace("%nargs%", str(i))
00140 
00141                 file.write(block)
